roe-ai/vectorless

PDF chatbot using LLMs, no vectors or server storage

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Chat with documents on the client side
  • RAG platform for chat with documents via multi-provider AI
  • AI chatbot project using LangChain and LangGraph that lets you chat with your PDFs
  • PDF processing toolkit for LLMs
  • Chat with PDFs using Together AI and Pinecone
  • turns PDFs and images into clean Markdown with AI
  • Next.js chatbot template using Vercel AI SDK and various LLMs
  • end-to-end vector search engine for text and images, handles embeddings and search out of the box
  • lightweight chat service for LLMs, no tracking
  • AI memory library for connecting conversations, documents, and code using graphs and vectors
